message.content:
cs.DC, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.NI 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper focuses on distributed computing and proposes a novel gradient coding scheme to mitigate straggling workers. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper introduces a new communication scheme (multi-message communication) to improve the completion time of each iteration, which involves information theory concepts. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper mentions that gradient descent methods are commonly employed in machine learning problems, and the proposed scheme aims to optimize the parameters of the model. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper deals with distributed computing systems and proposes a scheme to improve their performance. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper involves communication between workers and the master, and proposes a new communication scheme to improve the performance of the system.
